sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' const ToursDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id) const {photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour return ( <>

{title}
) } export default ToursDetails
